children.description: Content rendered inside the drawer (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes for notification drawer header.

closeButtonAriaLabel.description: Adds custom accessible text to the notification drawer close button.

customText.description: Notification drawer heading custom text which can be used instead of providing count/unreadText

onClose.description: Callback for when close button is clicked (Type: (event: KeyboardEvent | React.MouseEvent) => void)

unreadText.description: Notification drawer heading unread text used in combination with a count
